title: LF silver jg, adc and sup/top for clash
body:
We have a mid, i can top or sup depending on what is needed. 
Looking for easy going players who are serious about winning. :) 

Add me in game if u want to chat, or reply here. 

IGN: Firu

replies.body: good ad silver 2 here if u need
S1 Adc main here keen to play add me - ign : Innusta
